Queen Kapiolani Hotel Directly overlooking Queen Kapiolani Park and the best surf break at Waikiki, Queen Kapiolani rests on land once reserved for Hawaiian royalty. From this unique location you can walk through the 300-acre Kapiolani Park to reach Diamond Head's summit, ride a bike to Kahala, or turn right and dive into Waikiki's surf, shopping, and nightlife.
